## Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and prominently displayed against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a solid black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple yet striking, using high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 2 BATTERY Der leistungsstarke Akku-Hochdruckreiniger K 2 Battery für vielseitige, flexible Einsätze ohne Stromanschluss. 36-V-Wechselakku und Ladegerät sind als Sonderzubehör separat erhältlich. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.117-200.0 ## Text Content - Akkubetrieben, Akku und Ladegerät als Sonderzubehör erhältlich - Kompatibel mit der 36 V Kärcher Battery Power+ Plattform - Hochdruckreiniger inkl. Pistole mit Druckstufenanzeige ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278305158
Akku-Gerät 1
Akkupattform 36-V-Akkuplattform
Druck bar
Druckbereich max. 110
Fördermenge Hochdruck
Zulauftemperatur l/h
Laufzeit je Akkuladung max. 40
Farbe min 14
Gewicht ohne Zubehör gelb
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung 4,5 kg
Abmessungen (L × B × H) 7,6 kg
245 × 303 × 629 mm
### Ausstattung
Variante Akku und Ladegerät nicht inbegriffen
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q Boost
1-fach-Strahlrohr [x]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch m 4
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with a compact and portable design. It features a handle at the top for easy carrying. The front of the device has a visible brand logo. Attached to the side is a spray gun, which is secured in place. Below the handle, there is a circular control knob. In front of the pressure washer, there are two different spray wands. One wand has a simple nozzle, while the other has an adjustable nozzle for varying spray patterns. The overall design suggests ease of use and versatility for cleaning tasks. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, uppercase letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, large number "1" on the left side, partially obscured by a yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside the yellow arrow, the text reads: - **WORLD'S NO. 1** - **PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND** The text is in uppercase and appears to be a promotional or advertising statement, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market for pre-sliced sandwich products. The use of bold and contrasting colors (yellow and black) is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trust. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. - **Flag Design**: The flag is depicted in a triangular shape with the black stripe on top, followed by the red stripe in the middle, and the yellow stripe at the bottom. - **Text**: The phrase "Made in Germany" is written in a simple, bold font beneath the flag design. This logo is typically used to indicate that a product is manufactured in Germany, emphasizing quality and origin. ## Description The image is a simple icon representing a battery with the text "36V" inside it. The battery icon is stylized and appears to be a graphical representation rather than a real battery. The background is a gradient of gray, with the top part being lighter and the bottom part darker. The text "36V" is centered within the battery icon, indicating a voltage level of 36 volts. There are no additional labels, legends, or annotations present in the image. ## Description The image is a symbol indicating that a battery is not included. It features a simple graphic of a battery with a plus and minus sign, and a circle with an "X" over it. Below the graphic, the text reads "AKKU NICHT INBEGRIFFEN," which translates to "Battery not included" in English. The background is black, and the text and symbols are white, providing a clear contrast for easy readability. I'm unable to view the image you uploaded. Please describe the content or provide more details, and I'll be happy to help! I'm unable to accurately read the text from the image provided. The text appears to be blurred or unclear. If you can provide a clearer image or more context, I'd be happy to help!

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and prominently displayed against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a solid black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple yet striking, using high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 2 BATTERY

Der leistungsstarke Akku-Hochdruckreiniger K 2 Battery für vielseitige, flexible Einsätze ohne Stromanschluss. 36-V-Wechselakku und Ladegerät sind als Sonderzubehör separat erhältlich.

## Text Content

- Akkubetrieben, Akku und Ladegerät als Sonderzubehör erhältlich
- Kompatibel mit der 36 V Kärcher Battery Power+ Plattform
- Hochdruckreiniger inkl. Pistole mit Druckstufenanzeige

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278305158
Akku-Gerät 1
Akkupattform 36-V-Akkuplattform
Druck bar
Druckbereich max. 110
Fördermenge Hochdruck
Zulauftemperatur l/h
Laufzeit je Akkuladung max. 40
Farbe min 14
Gewicht ohne Zubehör gelb
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung 4,5 kg
Abmessungen (L × B × H) 7,6 kg
245 × 303 × 629 mm

### Ausstattung
Variante Akku und Ladegerät nicht inbegriffen
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q Boost
1-fach-Strahlrohr [x]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch m 4
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image shows a yellow and black pressure washer with a compact and portable design. It features a handle at the top for easy carrying. The front of the device has a visible brand logo. Attached to the side is a spray gun, which is secured in place. Below the handle, there is a circular control knob.

In front of the pressure washer, there are two different spray wands. One wand has a simple nozzle, while the other has an adjustable nozzle for varying spray patterns. The overall design suggests ease of use and versatility for cleaning tasks.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the outer edge. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, uppercase letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, large number "1" on the left side, partially obscured by a yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside the yellow arrow, the text reads:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1**
- **PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND**

The text is in uppercase and appears to be a promotional or advertising statement, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the market for pre-sliced sandwich products. The use of bold and contrasting colors (yellow and black) is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trust.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular design. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is prominently displayed. 

- **Flag Design**: The flag is depicted in a triangular shape with the black stripe on top, followed by the red stripe in the middle, and the yellow stripe at the bottom.
- **Text**: The phrase "Made in Germany" is written in a simple, bold font beneath the flag design.

This logo is typically used to indicate that a product is manufactured in Germany, emphasizing quality and origin.

## Description

The image is a simple icon representing a battery with the text "36V" inside it. The battery icon is stylized and appears to be a graphical representation rather than a real battery. The background is a gradient of gray, with the top part being lighter and the bottom part darker. The text "36V" is centered within the battery icon, indicating a voltage level of 36 volts. There are no additional labels, legends, or annotations present in the image.

## Description

The image is a symbol indicating that a battery is not included. It features a simple graphic of a battery with a plus and minus sign, and a circle with an "X" over it. Below the graphic, the text reads "AKKU NICHT INBEGRIFFEN," which translates to "Battery not included" in English. The background is black, and the text and symbols are white, providing a clear contrast for easy readability.
I'm unable to view the image you uploaded. Please describe the content or provide more details, and I'll be happy to help!
